mapper.select:
select cityname, platformid,IFNULL(storeno,'') AS storeno,storename, employeename, cusid,ordersn, dashang from ds_rewardtimes where year=#{year} and month=#{month}
and storeno IN (${storeids})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_rewardtimes ( cityname, platformid,storeno,storename, employeename, cusid,ordersn, dashang, year, month, createtime ) VALUES( #{cityname},#{platformid},#{storeno},#{storename},#{employeename},#{cusid},#{ordersn},#{dashang}, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),NOW() )
mapper.delete: delete from ds_rewardtimes where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
